goil.title: Goil
goil.description: I recently started my internship as a web developer, specifically focusing on front-end development, at Goil. I’m thrilled to be part of such a supportive and skilled team, and I’m eager to continue improving my abilities within the company. Working alongside talented professionals here is a fantastic opportunity, and I’m excited to contribute, learn, and grow each day.

daw.title: DAW
daw.description: I'm currently studying a higher vocational program in web development (DAW) at INS Camí de Mar in Calafell. This program is giving me a solid foundation in programming and teaching me how to approach coding challenges effectively each day. I'm gaining valuable skills and building strong programming logic, which I apply to my projects and continue developing as I grow in the field.
